title: OLX Course Policies
description: Course policies are defined in "policy.json" file inside "policy/<course-name>" directory.

start.description: The start date for the course.

advertised_start.description: The start date displayed in the course listing and course about pages.

disable_policy_graph.description: Whether the policy graph should be disabled (true) or not (false).

enrollment_start.description: The dates in which students can enroll in the course.

enrollment_end.description: The dates in which students can enroll in the course.

end.description: The end date for the course.

end_of_course_survey_url.description: The URL for an end of course survey. The link is shown after the course is over, next to certificate download links.

tabs.description: Custom pages, or tabs, in the courseware.

discussion_blackouts.description: An array of time intervals during which students cannot create or edit discussion posts.

show_calculator.description: Whether the calculator is shown in the course (true) or not (false).

days_early_for_beta.description: The number of days early that students in the beta-testers group can access the course.

pdf_textbooks.description: Have pdf-based textbooks on tabs in the courseware.

tab_title.description: The title of the textbook's tab in the courseware.

url.description: The URL to the PDF file.
The URL to the chapter's PDF file.

html_textbooks.description: The addition of HTML-based textbooks on tabs in the courseware.

cohorted_discussions.description: list of discussion topics that should be cohorted. Any not specified in this list are not cohorted.

auto_cohort_groups.description: If cohorted is true, each student is automatically assigned to a random group from this list, creating the group if needed.
